prompt_base: beautiful young alien woman, light mint green skin, short spiky white hair, large amethyst purple eyes, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, sci-fi lighting
feature_prompt: subsurface scattering on alien skin, individual spiky hair strands, realistic volume on hair, glossy seamless futuristic bodysuit texture, dynamic light reflections on eyes, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, human skin tone, organic, rough skin, helmet hair, low quality, deformed eyes, too dull, (human:1.2), normal hair color
